description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The plans for the MechFish, a remote mechanical recon device, have been stolen and used to create an evil counterpart: the DeathFish!  Armed with reflexes, a high powered vertical propulsion system, and an unlimited supply of explosive bombs and missiles, you must control your MechFish through 14 sidescrolling levels of dangerous enemy waters - dodging mines and destroying DeathFish along the way!
